content.rendered:
Directed by Irfan Kamal

Written by Vishal Vijay Kumar

Cast Anil Reji (Sridhar) . Saurabh Agnihotri (Kashmiri leader).Megha Akash. Babita Anant (Army Doctor). Anubha Arora (Hina). Rahul Jaykar Arya (Narad muni).Yogesh Bhardwaj. Pardeep Cheema (Subedar Jeetu singh). Sameer Deshpande (Nasir Hussain). Anupam Gahoi (Villager).Palomi Ghosh.Sanjay Gurbaxani.Chhaya Kadam. Sohaila Kapur (Shankar’s Mother). Mrigendra Konwar (Army man). Upendra Limaye (Inspector). Geetika Mehandru ((as Geetika Mehendru)). Anurag Mishra (Anwar). Bhawna Singh (Dancer). Shivani Sopori (Kashmiri Lady (as Shivaani Sopuri)). Prakash Vishwakarma (Joy babu)

Languages Hindi

Producers Shraddha Agrawal. Charan Dass. Murad Khetani. Niraj Kothari. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Naman Mehra. Yogiraj Shetty. Tarlok Singh. Rajesh Upadhyay. Ashwin Varde

Production Cine1 Studio. T-Series
